Question
========

In a study, 20 psychiatric patients with bipolar disorder *matched* with 20 psychiatric patients without bipolar disorder. It examines whether they differ in the nature and severity of complications at birth. This is an example of a

Answerlist
----------

* Case-control study.
* Cluster random sample.
* Randomized-block design.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Case-control study..: Correct
* Cluster random sample: Incorrect
* Randomized-block design..: Incorrect
